Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: proceeds from payments for other financing activities
right of use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability
right of use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from federal home loan bank borrowings
proceeds from issuance of commercial paper
proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from issuance of other long term debt
proceeds from lines of credit and issuance of commercial paper
proceeds from other short term debt
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of preferred stock and preference stock
Repayment of Debt: repayment of long term debt and finance leases
repayments of federal home loan bank borrowings
repayments of lines of credit and commercial paper
repayments of other short term debt
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock
payments for repurchase of common stock and nonvoting common stock
payments for repurchase of preferred stock and preference stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: capital expenditures incurred but not yet paid
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: common stock issued to acquire businesses
noncash changes in capital expenditures incurred by not yet paid
noncash or part noncash acquisition common stock issued and equity awards assumed
payments for proceeds from loans and leases
payments for proceeds from loans receivable
payments for proceeds from other investing activities
Purchases of Investments: payments for origination and purchases of loans held for sale
payments to acquire available for sale securities
payments to acquire available for sale securities debt
payments to acquire federal home loan bank stock
payments to acquire federal reserve stock
payments to acquire held to maturity securities
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of available for sale securities
proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of held to maturity securities
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale of federal home loan bank stock
proceeds from sale of federal reserve stock
proceeds from sale of loans held for sale
securities matured but not yet settled

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease excluding exchange rate effect
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in financial instruments used in operating activities
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in payables to broker dealers
increase decrease in payables to customers
increase decrease in receivables from brokerage clients
increase decrease in restricted cash and investments for operating activities
Depreciation and Amortization: accretion amortization of discounts and premiums investments
depreciation and amortization excluding amortization of intangible assets
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: other than temporary impairment losses investments portion recognized in earnings net
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities

__unmapped__: securities transferred from available for sale to held to maturity fair value
securities transferred from held to maturity to available for sale fair value
